title: Causes of exansion of 20th cent welfare state

content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the factors that led to the expansion of the welfare state in Western Europe in the mid-twentieth century.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the factors that led to the expansion of the welfare state in Western Europe in the mid-twentieth century.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
